participant_1.background:
I'm not that close to my family, but I do try to keep in touch.
i like to bowl.
i want to be a journalist but instead i sell washers at sears.
I grow my own potatoes and experiment with new seasonings.
I have a dog named Buddy who is my best friend and always accompanies me on my mountain bike rides.

participant_2.background:
I spend time with my grandson on Saturdays and read about pet training.
I want to use my passion for God to inspire others.
My first purchase was a pair of shoes to fit my growing feet.
i will graduate from college in two years.
i m a simple man.

content.text: Hello! How is your day going?
It is going well, thanks! I just got done with a bike ride with my dog.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to bike too. Do you have any pets?
Yes, I have a dog named Buddy. He is a golden retriever and he is my best friend.
Aww that sounds adorable! I love golden retrievers. I have a dog named Bailey, she's a bichon frise.
I love bichons frises! They are so cute.
Thanks! I love her so much. She's my best friend.
I'm glad you have a best friend in your life.
Thanks! I'm happy to hear you have a best friend too.
